Docs.summary: The last HTTP response received from the server.
Docs.remarks: The last response returned from the server during the lifecycle of this instance. An instance of sends requests to a server in UpdateStatusAsync, UpdateStatus, and other methods. Responses from these requests can be accessed using GetRawResponse.

Docs.param: A used for the periodical service calls.
Docs.summary: Periodically calls the server till the long-running operation completes.
Docs.returns: The last HTTP response received from the server.
Docs.remarks: This method will periodically call UpdateStatusAsync till HasCompleted is true, then return the final result of the operation.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Communication.Email.EmailSendResult> WaitForCompletion(valuetype System.TimeSpan suggestedPollingInterval, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function WaitForCompletion (suggestedPollingInterval As TimeSpan, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Response(Of EmailSendResult)

Docs.param: The interval between status requests to the server. The interval can change based on information returned from the server. For example, the server might communicate to the client that there is not reason to poll for status change sooner than some time. In that case, it uses the larger of the values between this value and the one returned from the server.
A used for the periodical service calls.
Docs.summary: Periodically calls the server till the long-running operation completes.
Docs.returns: The last HTTP response received from the server.
Docs.remarks: This method will periodically call UpdateStatus till HasCompleted is true, then return the final result of the operation.
